meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Dave Gordon Laura Crain Donna Radu Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1963.

td.p: Dave Gordon, an attorney originally from Santa Ana, California
Laura Crain, a student and housewife from New Orleans, Louisiana
Donna Radu, a music administrator from Radnor, Pennsylvania (whose 1-day cash winnings total $18,401)

tr.td: BOTANY
APPETIZERS
THEME PARKS
MUSICAL TERMS
ATTACKERS
KINGLY NICKNAMES
